home_job: Full stack web developer, UI/UX designer, freelancer, Github addict.
about_desc: Hello! I'm Sonali Yadav, A passionate MERN Stack developer. I develop web applications, mobile applications, and desktop applications. My core skill is based on JavaScript and I love to do most of the things using JavaScript. I love to make the web more open to the world. I am currently pursuing with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering from Rama University at kanpur, India in 2022.
experience_0_overview: it is the great time when I am working as Full stack Web developer, I learn a lot that will enhance my skills as a full stack developer.In which I have closely observed the front-end and back-end operations.My Responsibilities include initial research, planning and designing of the project, creating wireframes, and writing executing on a specification.
experience_1_overview: Relevant Courses : Database Management Systems, Algorithms & Optimization for Big Data, Machine Learning, Java
projects_2_overview: Foundation using HTML, CSS, JavaScript by Duke University
projects_1_extended_overview: Tunflix is a streaming website: it allows you to watch movies by scraping data from the internet. The UI is modern and base on material design
projects_2_extended_overview: codehub.tn is a showcase website for Code Hub: a coworking space at Sousse for developers
projects_3_extended_overview: Burpees.io is a solution for gyms. you can see plannings, take reservations and more. We've developed a white labalise app: If a client wants his native application it will be generated automatically. The dashboard is for the gym owner.
